attributes.action: Your Vote - Voting in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every one has the right to vote.
Every one in the UK has a NHS number and something like this number should be used to vote - If you do not vote you lose you TAX credit or you receive a credit to your pension.
Please note if you do not vote some one could use your vote in E - Voting, which Labour has set up.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
